display_long_description:
Get ready to run, jump, and roll through our meticulously designed stages with unparalleled excitement!
Join our vibrant cast of characters, including Bullseye the Bull, Daisy the Cow, Garry the Goat, Marty the Horse-Pig, and Clucky the Chicken. Each animal possesses unique abilities and personalities that will make your racing experience unforgettable.
Immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes of "Band Of Hooves." From the picturesque countryside farm to the enchanting Greek seaside town and the awe-inspiring pirate island perched on a cliff, every scene will leave you breathless. 
Prepare to be blown away by the innovative and hilarious controls we've incorporated into "Band Of Hooves." Swing your arms to sprint at lightning speed, raise both arms for epic jumps, and swing arms to execute gravity-defying somersaults. Be prepared for the wildest parkour race and facing the different challenges in the map. You can also punch NPC out of the road if you wanna and experiment the laughing moment!

【Road Map】
The Game initial launch with single player mode and two epic map. The 2nd wave will release on 15th January 2024 with multi player mode and the third map "PirateIperil". Exercise your skillset and be prepare for that. You will party with your friends and anonymous runner and squeeze your potential then!
